text: Ra jaba yiniharule kunai nirlajjatapurna aslila kama gardachan taba bhandachan ki, hamile aphna babuâ€“bajela'i yastai gareko dekheka chaum ra allahale pani hamila'i yahi adesa gareko cha. Bhanidinus ki, allaha nirlajjatako adesa kahile pani dindaina. Timile allahako barema yasta kura kina gardachau jasako visayama kunai jnana chaina
